entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is speaking to someone, addressing them as 'Lord' and expressing terror. The text describes the goblin's black eyes being wide with terror.

entities.name: lord
entities.description: The lord is being addressed by the goblin, who is stammering and trying to explain something.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is mentioned as having ways of revealing impostors.
